short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show TOC of Notion Page、Publish your Notion pages to your Github Jekyll blog, and upload the blog images to an OSS service.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
0.4.2: Fix bugs and add custom module handling code formatting error alerts.
---
0.4.1: Support self-built OSS compatible with AWS S3 API
---
0.4.0: bugfix
---
Using this plugin's basic features, you can view the title of Notion content in Chrome SidePanel, while advanced features enable you to build a blog publishing workflow based on Notion. Additionally, the plugin's AI tools can assist you in processing Notion content, enhancing your work and life efficiency.
---
使用此插件的基本功能，您可以在Chrome SidePanel中查看Notion内容的标题，而高级功能使您能够基于 Notion 构建 Github 博客发布工作流程。此外，该插件的 AI 工具可以帮助您处理 Notion 内容，提高您的工作和生活效率。
